msg-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
msg-delete-hierarchy-group-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the folder '{{name}}' and all its contents?
ttl-breadcrumbs.user-settings.label: User Settings

tutorial.label: Tutorial
tutorial.description: Learn how to use Weavcraft with step-by-step tutorials, covering a wide range of topics and features.

gallery.label: Craft Gallery
gallery.description: Discover themes, widgets and websites created by other users, and engage with the Weavcraft community.

themes.label: Theme Styles
themes.description: Customize the look and feel of your website with a variety of pre-designed themes and styles.

widgets.label: Widget Storage
widgets.description: Manage and organize your collection of customized widgets for easy access and reuse in your web pages.

pages.label: Web Pages
pages.description: Create and edit your web pages effortlessly, with options to configure data sources, and add interactive elements.

websites.label: Websites
websites.description: View, manage, and customize your personal websites, including URL settings, and theme selection.
